column3: Large foam pad used to protect climbers from falls while bouldering.
A bag used to hold chalk, keeping climber's hands dry and improving grip.
A brush used to clean holds and remove excess chalk and dirt from climbing routes.
Shoes with superior grip for advanced climbers
Comfortable and supportive shoes for beginners
Protective headgear designed to protect climbers from falling debris.
Entry-level climbing harness for beginner climbers.
Advanced climbing harness with additional features for experienced climbers.
Dynamic rope suitable for lead climbing and top-roping.
Static rope ideal for rappelling and rescue operations.
Set of quickdraws used to connect the rope to bolts on the climbing route.
Set of artificial climbing holds for building indoor climbing routes.
Device used to control the rope during belaying, lowering, or rappelling.
Specialized tape used to protect skin and prevent injuries while climbing.
Locking carabiner for securing critical climbing equipment.
Versatile shoes suitable for all types of climbing
Stretchable pants providing flexibility and durability
Lightweight and breathable shirt for climbers
Jacket with insulation for colder climbs
